data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Nieuwe Hoop cruise from Suriname to Middelburg started at 1771-06-17
Ship: Nieuwe Hoop (Snauw), Voyage: Suriname - Middelburg, 1st Observer: J. Wilton (Schipper), Company: MCC
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
